entities.description: Reference to the frequency of substance use in the past year, interchangeable with the term '12-Month Frequency'.
Frequency of alcohol use in the past year.
Frequency of marijuana use in the past year.
Frequency of cocaine use in the past year.
Indicator showing the type of data imputation for the substance use frequency data.
Substance use frequency data collected directly from survey respondents.
Substance use frequency data logically assigned when responses are incomplete or inconsistent.
Substance use frequency data imputed using statistical methods for complete cases.
Indicator for individuals who have never used a specific substance within the past year or in their lifetime.
Indicator for individuals who did not use a specific substance in the past year.
Frequency value for the substance use data.
Percentage value representing the portion of the population.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the frequency of substance use in the past year.
Relates past year substance use to alcohol usage frequency.
Relates past year substance use to marijuana usage frequency.
Relates past year substance use to cocaine usage frequency.
Indicates the type of imputation used for alcohol frequency data.
Indicates the type of imputation used for marijuana frequency data.
Indicates the type of imputation used for cocaine frequency data.
Types of imputation indicators such as 'Questionnaire Data', 'Logically Assigned Data', and 'Statistically Imputed Data'
Specific frequency values for the substance use data.
Specific percentage values representing the portion of the population using the substance.
